Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Extends and expands the scope of the on-demand E-hail paratransit pilot
Summary: Extends and expands the scope of the on-demand E-hail paratransit pilot to include an additional 1,200 users.
LawCode: Amd ยง1205, Pub Auth L; amd ยง15-b, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the transportation law, in relation to extending and expanding the scope of the on-demand E-hail paratransit pilot
